title: Strengthening Practical App Development Competencies: Blended Experimental·Simulation Approaches for Enhancing High School Physics Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational physics theories and experimental procedures at the secondary school level
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Over a 4-week midterm course, learners observe ≥3 physical phenomena (e.g., vibration, electromagnetic induction, fluid dynamics) using LIBEs (Laboratory Inquiry-Based Experiments), visualize experimental data with Python tools (Pandas, Matplotlib), and submit quantitative analysis reports with ≤5% error margins.
Cultivation of virtual experiment design and variable manipulation skills using Interactive Computer-Based Simulations (ICBSs).
Reduced cognitive load and over 20% improvement in conceptual understanding compared to traditional instruction.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
